channel.title: IIBM on IIBMers
channel.description: Recent content in IIBM on IIBMers

item.title: Back to the lab
item.description: During 2020 and 2021, the pandemic forced to work remotely from home in our projects and research, we adapted our regular meetings to be online. Lately, the university has allowed to enter the labs, so we started to assist and meet personally.

item.title: Funds 2021
item.description: During 2021, we have been working remotely in different projects, we obtained funding from DAE UC and Artificia la UC You can see the post from different sources: Vive la UC here
